StudyPlan.Name: Learning
StudyPlan.Description: A simple plan with plenty of time for deep learning of notes. Best started weeks before an exam.

StudyPlan.Name: Exam Cure
StudyPlan.Description: A kinda intense study plan. Best completed plenty of time before an exam for reviewing (not learning) your notes.

StudyPlan.Name: Kid to Einstein ASAP
StudyPlan.Description: An incredibly intense study plan. Best suited for a level 100 procrastinator who barely has a week of study before the exam.
